blogScreen.text1: Fairy Nature has the opportunity to participate in the new experience of the Alinea brand, which has opened its doors to creation and craftsmanship with its new ephemeral place of exchanges and sharing: the Alinea Counter.
text2: Thus, the Counter offers an exceptional showcase to all artisans, creators, and local businesses who share the same values and convictions as Alinea, allowing you to meet them and immerse yourself in their universe.
It's the perfect opportunity for Fairy Nature, a young emerging brand, to promote the launch of its first three solid natural cosmetics: Feather Deodorant, Cocoon Makeup Remover, and Precious Care.
Fairy Nature is present from September 15th to October 16th, 2021, at the Alinea store in Avignon-Le Pontet, to exhibit, introduce, and allow you to test its solid cosmetics.
